flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: How to turn a broken trampoline into a new piece of furniture.
lines.text_raw: How to turn a broken trampoline into a new piece of furniture.

lines.text: Cut the trampoline frame into 14 pieces (don't cut the two base pieces so you will be able to slide the other pipes over them).
lines.text_raw: Cut the trampoline frame into 14 pieces (don't cut the two base pieces so you will be able to slide the other pipes over them).

lines.text: Cut the mat (trying to save as much of it as possible).
lines.text_raw: Cut the mat (trying to save as much of it as possible).

lines.text: Bolt the pipes together and sew the mat on to create your very own Bencholene.
lines.text_raw: Bolt the pipes together and sew the mat on to create your very own Bencholene.

guide.summary: Turn your broken trampoline into a fun outdoor bench.
guide.title: Bencholene
